physical_appearance: This is a small pair of trousers. The fabric is printed with bouquets of peonies, and its hem is decorated with a floral embroidery border.
sgcool_label_text: This pair of trousers was probably made for a child. The fabric is printed with bouquets of peonies. Its hem is decorated with an embroidered floral border. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of garments worn by Peranakan men and women.
subject_terms_2: Ethnic costume Motifs Peranakan (Asian people) Pants
